arts.ttl: Frustrated Omer Riza slams defensive lapse as Cardiff City go down at Sunderland
arts.sum: Cardiff were beaten 2-1 by Sunderland at the Stadium of Light

arts.ttl: Sunderland strike late to beat Cardiff and boost promotion hopes
arts.sum: Sunderland maintained the pressure on their Championship promotion rivals with a hard-fought 2-1 win against Cardiff at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Chris Mepham secures Sunderland victory over Cardiff
arts.sum: Struggling Cardiff remain 21st but are now just four points above the relegation zone.

The Black Cats took the lead within the opening two minutes of play, as they capitalised on a loose clearance before Eliezer Mayenda curled home from just inside the City area. Callum Robinson had the Bluebirds’ first clear cut chance as he won the ball at the edge of the area before lashing a left footed effort goalwards, though it flew just wide.

arts.ttl: “Much success” – Agent wishes Sunderland player well for ‘new challenge’, contract already signed
arts.sum: Sunderland’s Jewison Bennette is edging closer towards completing a move to FC LNZ Cherkasy. Earlier this week, we covered claims from Ukraine that LNZ Cherkasy will offer €500,000 including bonuses to the Black Cats to acquire his signature. arts.ttl: Isidor starts: Sunderland team news and predicted XI to face Cardiff City
arts.sum: The latest Sunderland team news as Regis Le Bris' side gear up to face Cardiff City in the Championship this weekend. The post Isidor starts: Sunderland team news and predicted XI to face Cardiff City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Club ‘will soon’ sign Sunderland player – Black Cats exit ‘one step away’
arts.sum: Last month, claims from Ukraine reported FC LNZ Cherkasy’s concrete interest in Sunderland’s Jewison Bennette. LNZ Cherkasy have already made firm progress in their efforts to sign the winger before the winter market in Ukraine closes on March 11th. On Thursday, journalist Ihor Burbas stated LNZ Cherkasy will offer Sunderland €500,000 including bonuses for Bennette. The post Club ‘will soon’ sign Sunderland player – Black Cats exit ‘one step away’ appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Preview: Sunderland vs. Cardiff City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Sunderland and Cardiff City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Report: Dortmund "ahead of the game" in pursuit of Jobe Bellingham
arts.sum: BVB are favourites to land the younger brother of Jude Bellingham despite a raft of other European clubs including RB Leipzig keen to acquire his services.
